reviewText: Basically, for the price of a couple of beers you get to hang out for an hour with one of the best living Chicago blues harp players,  No particular "how to" material, but some useful tips and plenty of background on the music.  How can you go wrong?

Billy Boy Arnold is a bluesman plain and simple his dvd gives an in depth history of his journey into the Chicago blues scene i really enjoyed his stories and his harp play he goes into different harps chromatic ect., it is not particularly instructional but he instructs you to the fact that if you want to be good at the harp you must play everyday.there is nothing magic about the harmonica you have to put in the work.
